alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 29 at 9:30PM EDT until April 01 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma affecting Sumter, Macon and Dooly Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Lovejoy, Peachtree City, Fayetteville, Americus, Peachtree City, Woolsey, Sharpsburg, Peachtree City, Peachtree City, Senoia, Griffin, Griffin, Orchard Hill, Molena, Thomaston, Carsonville, Montezuma, Byromville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma. * WHEN...From this evening to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25 feet, Flooding of auto store at west end of Highway 26 and 49 occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 20.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
